references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces the Neural Radiance Field (NeRF) method, a foundational technique for novel view synthesis that many subsequent HDR NVS methods build upon.

references.paper_title: Hdr-nerf: High dynamic range neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper extends NeRF to handle high dynamic range (HDR) images, directly addressing the problem of limited dynamic range in traditional NVS methods.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, a significantly faster alternative to ray tracing for novel view synthesis, which is directly adopted and extended by the current work.

references.paper_title: Recovering high dynamic range radiance maps from photographs
references.reason: This paper presents a foundational method for recovering high dynamic range (HDR) images from multiple low dynamic range (LDR) images, providing essential background on HDR imaging.
